keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union, and that's why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
The NHS and Social Care have been driven into the ground by the Tories' cuts. We will invest £6bn more to support these vital services, ensuring everyone receives the care they need.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening. Schools in West Sussex face massive cuts in funding, short-changing our children and harming their education.
Families across West Sussex have suffered disruption from the poor service provided by Southern Rail. Morwen will fight for the contract to be removed from Govia so that there is a reliable network.
